title: The Planets
brief_description: The Planets - Gustav Holst’s greatest orchestral work - presents Eastern mysticism tinged with pagan fantasy and thoughts of the Planets shedding rays of influence upon the Earth and upon Mankind. Features the French National Orchestra, one of the most remarkable symphonic ensembles in the world, conducted by Lorin Maazel. Rated: G
